document.full_text: a team of mountaineers led by a veteran sherpa guide flew to mount everest on an expedition to clear away tons of trash left on the world's highest peak.
document.title: asia: nepal: cleaning up everest litter
lines_and_colors: a team of mountaineers led by a veteran sherpa guide flew to mount everest on an expedition to clear away tons of trash left on the world's highest peak.
